group_1.textRight: Well? Anything?

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2][se:7211_souljem_02]...
No, I don't sense her... I can't reach her@through my Soul Gem either...

group_1.textRight: I don't want to even think this, but did@we...mess up again?

group_1.textLeft: That can't be it!
Everything's going smoothly...@I'll prove it.
We have to do this, for her...

group_1.textRight: Sorry...this really isn't the time to hesitate.
Things just got to me because we're strangers@here, and everything's unfamiliar...

group_1.textLeft: I feel the same...
If it weren't for what happened, we@wouldn't be in this city to begin with.

group_1.narration: That's right... We ended up here@completely by accident.
The reason us Magical Girls from Asunaro@wound up in Kamihama is...

group_1.textRight: This is...Kamihama City, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: So, we're not even in Asunaro City?

group_1.textRight: The chase was pretty intense, but I didn't@think we'd end up outside the city.

group_1.narration: That day, we were pursuing a Witch.@But during the chase, we left the city and@came to Kamihama without noticing...

group_1.textLeft: The Witch we're after is most likely@here.

group_1.textRight: So what now? We're in unknown territory.@I don't know this place at all...

group_1.textLeft: We have to keep up the pursuit!

group_1.textRight: Kazumi...

group_1.textLeft: You told me all about it, right, Kaoru?
About how Witches bring misery@to people...
There's no WAY I'd back down@while knowing that!

group_1.textRight: You're right.
Then let's go after it!

group_1.textLeft: Yup!

group_1.narration: And something was waiting for us...

group_1.textCenter: What the heck's going on?!@Umikaaa! Kaoruuu!!

group_1.narration: When I came to, the Witch, the Labyrinth,@Kazumi and Umika... Everything was gone.
We'd each been flung away to different@parts of Kamihama City by some mysterious force.
I managed to meet up with Umika, but we still@have no idea where Kazumi is...

group_1.textLeft: This city is far too vast to search@with just the two of us.
If we move around separately too much,@we'll probably lose track of each other again...

group_1.textRight: If there were any food joints we knew here,@she could be at one of those.
But it's not like Mr. Tachibana would@somehow have a cafe in every city...
Can't you use X File to read the city's@information?

group_1.textLeft: I tried that a little while ago, but it seems@like the city's affected by some kind of magic...
Kaoru, behind you! I see someone!

group_1.textRight: Huh?
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:4011A04][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Waaaaaah!

group_1.textLeft: Kaoru! Are you all right?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I just barely dodged it.

group_1.textLeft: That was out of nowhere...@What was it? A Familiar?

group_1.textRight: Familiar or not... whether it's soccer or@battle, I'm not the type to sit around waiting.
Umika!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, time to transform!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, kick-off time!
Wha?!

group_1.textLeft: This can't be right! How?!
